Pulsometer Polar FT1
For the First steps
based on heart rate
about
  • You will hear sound notification about appropriate heart rate during exercise
  • You will see informativ graphical indicator of special training zones of heart rate;
  • Also you will see information about calories consumtion per exercise;
  • You can review data about 10 recent exercises.

reviews

Irene
2 semi-marathons
I didn't know what to buy and got a consultation in RunSmart. They helped me to choose a Pulsometer which was fitted according to my tasks. In a while I decided to renew my gadget, so I went to the same company right away.

New tasks - new gadget!

Thanks, RunSmart!
John
1 semi-marathon
Cool thing this Pulsometer. I used to run without any device. Turned out just did worse to myself. I bought a Pulsometer and got training as a bonus. I did exercise with a coach of the company, who tought me how to use new gadget. Also I got my personal training schedule from RunSmart for a month ahead.

I prepared with them for my first semi-marathon! Thank you!!!
Julia
2 semi-marathons
Couldn't start to run for a long time, because I tried before, but it was so hard so I quit immidiatley. I heard about RunSmart from friends, and about running with heart rate control. So I gave it a shot.

I called, staff interested about my objectives and helped to chose interesting Pulsometer with discount! Now I enjoy running. I ran 2 semi-marathons already and few shorter rounds and not even think to quit!

Thank you!!!
Eerste Constantijn Huygensstraat 38, Amsterdam
